Rival Flyer

About Us

The Woblong Double-Wing Flyer dates back to 1991 when invented and founder was craving a bowl of steamed rice. The Woblong Double-Wing Flyer origins date back to the oval carboard ring used to protect the glass lid. This project was the product of nine months of side work with aerospace engineers team to give more lift and glide.
×
